attributes.action: continue to strongly encourage medical testing on animals
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UK needs to encourage testing of potentially life-saving drugs on animals while discouraging vanity-based cosmetic testing.  Too many people still die and lead broken lives because of disease and congenital conditions which could be treated or even cured.  Animal rights are a luxury the sick and dying cannot afford.
